nodes.text: Desten was an airless rock planet with five moons that occupied the fifth orbital position around the star Abo. It was located within the Lehon system, a part of the Unknown Regions' area known as the Tempered Wastes.
Desten was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the Lehon system, and therefore Desten, in grid square G-11.
